quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Gilmore Girls and Stan
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stars, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On the show Gilmore Girls, at Lukes Diner, Reverend Skinner makes reference to which character of Harper Lees book To Kill A Mockingbird?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boo Radley

questions.question: Which of these cartoons was created by Seth MacFarlane, the creator of American Dad?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What does Gilmore Girls character Lorelai write at the Cheshire Cats guestbook while checking out?

options.text: Satanic forces are at work here
A perfect situation for a fool

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Satanic forces are at work here

questions.question: Klaus is a talking fish who lives with the Smiths in the animated series American Dad. He was once an Olympic skier, but the CIA swapped his brainwaves with those of a goldfish to prevent him from winning the gold medal. What nationality is Klaus?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: German

questions.question: In the two-part American Dad episode, Stan of Arabia, Stan plans a surprise party for his boss, Bullock. At the party, Stan accidentally kills the celebrity guest speaker, and has to perform the roast himself. Who was the celebrity guest speaker killed by Stan?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jay Leno

questions.question: In the pilot episode of American Dad, Steve wants a dog, in the hopes that it will help him get girls. When Stan brings home the dog, it is 19 years old and near death. How does the dog actually die?

options.text: It has a heart attack when Roger knocks over a glass.
It does not die. Haley left the front door open and it ran away.
It dies from old age in the middle of the night.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was shot by Stan.

questions.question: In the animated series American Dad, Roger is an alien who lives with the family. The family must keep Roger a secret, but he has left the house on a few occasions in various disguise. Which of the following is not a disguise worn by Roger?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A doctor

questions.question: On Gilmore Girls, who plays Romeo in the final scene of Romeo and Juliet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paris Geller

questions.question: In the series American Dad, Stan meet his wife Francine during college. She was on the side of the road hitchhiking and he gave her a ride. During the ride Stan hits a raccoon and then shoots it to put it out of its misery. Francine thought this was cruel and ran away.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: American Dad first aired as a sneak preview on February 6, 2005 after the end of Super Bowl XXXIX.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On the TV show Gilmore Girls, what book does Rory make Jess read, after he asked what that crazy woman was rambling about?

options.text: The Clan of the Cave Bear

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fountainhead

questions.question: How does Lane describe Korea upon her arrival back to Stars Hollow on the show Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bootleg Paradise

questions.question: Complete this line delivered on Gilmore Girls by Sherry while she was in labor: Maureen told me that  .......................  said that he heard that if you squat it makes the baby come out faster.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Howard Stern

questions.question: We have buried the putrid corpse of liberty was among the possible lines for Lorelai and Maxs wedding on the show Gilmore Girls. Who is this quote attributed to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Benito Mussolini

questions.question: Who is Kirk most afraid of on the Gilmore Girls show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kirk

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mannix and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The character of Mr. Lucas was replaced in the 8th season of Are You Being Served? by a real life former British pop star.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This western actor appeared in 14 episodes of Rowan  Martins Laugh-In.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Wayne

questions.question: What year saw the final episode of the British classic sitcom Are You Being Served?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1985

questions.question: After the Terminator uttered his famous Ill be back line in the 1984 film, The Terminator, he came back in a police car.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was the name of the large detective agency for which Mannix worked during the first season of the self-titled show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Intertect

questions.question: In 2004 Britain did a poll ranking British sitcoms. Where did Are You being Served? rank on this poll?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 20th

questions.question: Actor John Inman played the role of what member of menswear in the hit British sitcom Are You Being Served?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Humphries

questions.question: This legendary actor, who starred in the 2007 production of Strange Wilderness, appeared on the Laugh-In program twice.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ernest Borgnine

questions.question: Stephen Peacock was the floorwalker (floor manager) on Are You Being Served?. What was his other title?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Captain

questions.question: What was the name of Mannix secretary on the TV show Mannix?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peggy

questions.question: This comic and member of the Sinatra Rat Pack appeared on Rowan  Martins Laugh-In 3 times and guest hosted the Tonight Show 16 times. He was a regular guest on the Dean Martin Show and the Dean Martin Roasts.  He also appeared on Match Game 73.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joey Bishop

questions.question: In what year did the British sitcom Are You Being Served? first hit British airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1972

questions.question: What king of vehicle were the Clampetts of the 60s series The Beverly Hillbillies driving when they arrived in Beverly Hills?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a Flatbed Truck

questions.question: What actor played Mannix on the self-titled TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mike Connors

questions.question: What was the first name of fictional private investigator Mannix?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joe

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Raven and Ravens

questions.question: What does Raven from the show Thats So Raven want to be?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fashion Designer

questions.question: In 2001 Marilyn Milian became which consecutive judge of The Peoples Court?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4th

questions.question: What is the name of Ravens dads restaurant on the show Thats So Raven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Chill Grill

questions.question: In the Thats So Raven episode, titled Wheres Theres Smoke, what is Corys girlfriends name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cindy

questions.question: What is on Corys wish list on the sitcom Thats So Raven?

questions.question: What is the name of Corys pet hamster on the show Thats So Raven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lionel

questions.question: Ravens brother Cory has a show that is a spin-off of Thats So Raven. What is the name of the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cory in the House

questions.question: Where was The Peoples Court originally filmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: California

questions.question: In the American judge show The Peoples Court, if a litigant does not like the judges decision, they can appeal.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is Ravens moms name on the sitcom Thats So Raven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tanya Baxter

questions.question: Country music singer Jud Strunk,  who sang Daisy a Day, appeared on Laugh-In, lost a Senate election in Maine by one vote and died in 1981.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of Ravens favorite boy band on the sitcom Thats So Raven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boyz N Motion

questions.question: Raven, from the TV series Thats So Raven has what power?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Psychic visions

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Peoples Court and Role
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, judge, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the first medical show on American television?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: City Hospital

questions.question: On Ben Casey, young  Dr. Casey was tutored by an older neurosurgeon who always said Ben Casey, you know everything about medicine but nothing about people.  What was the name of Ben Caseys mentor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Zorba

questions.question: At one time, the show The Peoples Court was presided over by the husband of the famous Judge Judy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Judge Joseph Wapner from the The Peoples Court graduated from which law school?

options.text: University of Southern California School of Law
New York University School of Law

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: University of Southern California School of Law

questions.question: This fine medical show starred Denzel Washington, David Morse, Norman Lloyd, and Howie Mandel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: St. Elsewhere

questions.question: This TV show was the first to give paramedics an important role in saving (TV) lives. It starred Julie  London and Robert Fuller and aired 1972-1979.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emergency!

questions.question: This was the first prime time TV show to center on the lives of hospital nurses.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Nurses

questions.question: Which medical show aired from 1969-1976 and starred James Daley and Chad Everett?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Medical Center

questions.question: What role did William Christopher play on M*A*S*H, one of the longest running and most popular TV medical shows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Father Mulcahy

questions.question: This popular medical show starred Richard Boone, who also played Paladin on a hit TV western.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Medic

questions.question: Which country has started its own version of the American judge show The Peoples Court?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: United Kingdom

questions.question: The Peoples Court has filmed more than 3000 episodes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Jack Klugman portrayed a California medical examiner in Quincy M.E.. Which actor portrayed his  assistant?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Ito

questions.question: William Shatner was the original choice to play the lead in this TV series but he rejected the role.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Kildare

questions.question: Judge Marilyn Milian was appointed as an Assistant State Attorney before she appeared in show The Peoples Court.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the TV series General Hospital, Lucky Spencer was killed by Helena Cassidine in a fire.
